exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat x : nat -> nat i : nat H : i <= n Unable to unify "x" with "nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) 1 (fun n Hrecn : nat => x n * Hrecn)".
No such bound variable i (possible names are: n, m and p).

original: intros n x i H. intros H0. apply divProd. apply le_lt_trans with (i:=i); auto.
